meta.name: Heimdall Design System
meta.description: Clean, elegant, and professional design system for a security scanning platform. Inspired by Linear, Vercel, and Stripe Dashboard. Conveys trust through clarity, not aggression. v2.0 adds Indigo accent identity, depth through elevation, and richer interactive states — without breaking the minimal foundation. v2.1 adds Emerald as a complementary color for success, health, and positive states. v2.2 introduces dual-accent theming: Emerald replaces Indigo as the primary interactive accent in light mode, while Indigo remains the primary interactive accent in dark mode.

changelog.2.2.0: Dual-accent theming: light mode accent = emerald-600 (#059669), dark mode accent = indigo-400 (#818CF8). Added accent-primary-* tokens to both light and dark color sets. Updated all components that hardcoded indigo in light mode to reference accent tokens or provide explicit light/dark variants. Renamed button.indigo to button.accent and badge.indigo to badge.accent with theme-split values. Added focus-ring.accent. Added emerald-md shadow. Updated guidelines with accent-theme-split rationale.
changelog.2.1.0: Added emerald palette as complementary color for success/positive states. Updated success tokens (light: emerald-600, dark: emerald-400). Added emerald-sm and emerald-glow shadows. Updated badge.success, states.success-inline, card.success variant, scan-results status-completed badge, and landing scan-states.success with emerald tokens.
changelog.2.0.0: Added indigo accent palette, elevation tokens, glow effects, refined all interactive states, per-page visual enhancements, scanner card patterns, sidebar active indicator

elevation.description: Elevation layers for visual depth. Applied via shadow + subtle background shifts.

accent.description: Theme-aware accent focus ring. Use this instead of focus-ring.indigo for interactive elements. Light mode uses emerald, dark mode uses indigo.

card.description: Container principal para agrupamento de conteúdo

metric.note: border-top color is determined by the metric type: accent-primary for general (emerald light / indigo dark), success for positive, warning for medium risk, destructive for critical

scanner.description: Card for individual scanner selection (ScannerSelector component)

button.description: Botões de ação com variantes semânticas

accent.description: Theme-aware accent button for primary CTAs. Light mode uses emerald, dark mode uses indigo. Replaces the former 'indigo' button variant.

indigo.description: Legacy alias — kept for backward compatibility. Prefer button.accent for new implementations. In dark mode this renders as indigo; in light mode prefer button.accent which uses emerald.

badge.description: Indicadores visuais de status, severidade e categorias

accent.description: Theme-aware accent badge for active filters, feature tags, and emphasis. Light mode uses emerald, dark mode uses indigo. Replaces the former 'indigo' badge variant.

sections.notes: Fundo page com gradient radial sutil. Card com shadow-md. Sem split-screen layout — manter simples e centrado.

sections.content: URL alvo + data/hora + duração + status badge. Botão re-scan e exportar PDF.
sections.notes: Background muted sutil. URL em font mono. Status badge (completed/failed). Botões à direita do header.

sections.name: severity-summary
sections.content: 4-5 stat cards mostrando contagem por severidade (Critical, High, Medium, Low, Info)
sections.notes: Grid horizontal. Cada card usa borda superior com a cor da severidade. Destaque visual no mais crítico.

sections.name: findings-tabs
sections.content: Abas: Overview | Headers | SSL | Ports | Redirects | Robots | Sensitive Paths | Technologies
sections.notes: Cada aba com badge de contagem (variant accent). Active tab com underline emerald (light) / indigo (dark). Conteúdo em accordions com severity indicator lateral.

sections.content: Accordion com: severity badge + título + description. Expandido: evidence em code-block + recommendation.
sections.notes: Visual limpo com hierarquia clara. Severity badge à esquerda, sempre visível. Borda esquerda colorida pela severidade.

summary-card.note: The summary card gets a strong left accent border based on the overall risk level

sections.content: Card de resumo: overall risk badge (Critical/High/Medium/Low) + texto resumido da IA + contagem de findings por severidade.
sections.notes: Card com borda esquerda colorida pelo overall risk. Risk badge grande e proeminente. Texto da IA em tamanho base com boa legibilidade.

sections.name: ai-findings-list
sections.content: Lista de findings da IA em accordions. Cada finding com: severidade + categoria + título + descrição + recomendação.
sections.notes: Agrupar por severidade (Critical primeiro). Accordion para manter densidade gerenciável. Severity badge sempre visível no trigger.

dashboard.name: Dashboard
dashboard.description: Visão geral com gráficos e métricas do sistema (admin/user)

sections.name: kpi-row
sections.content: 4 stat cards: Total Users, Total Scans, Scans Hoje, Avg Risk Score
sections.notes: Grid 4 colunas. Usar card variant 'metric' com borda superior por tipo. Trend indicators com setas e porcentagem de variação.

sections.name: charts-grid
sections.content: Grid 2x2: Severity Distribution (donut), Scan Trends (area), Category Breakdown (bar horizontal), User Registration Trend (area)
sections.notes: Usar paleta de charts do design system com accent-primary como cor primária (emerald light, indigo dark). Gráficos com títulos e subtítulos dentro do card container. Tooltips estilizados. Area charts com fill accent/10.

sections.name: recent-activity
sections.content: Tabela com últimas ações do sistema (scans, registros, etc.)
sections.notes: Tabela compacta sem paginação, últimos 10 itens. Link 'Ver todos' em accent-primary.

scan-history.name: Histórico de Scans
scan-history.description: Tabela paginada e filtrável com todos os scans realizados

sections.name: header

sections.notes: Layout flex com título à esquerda e controles à direita. Filtros ativos mostrados como badges accent.

sections.name: data-table
sections.content: Colunas: Target URL, Date, Status, Duration, Risk Level, Actions (view, export, delete). Paginação inferior.
sections.notes: Usar DataTable do shadcn com sorting e column visibility. Coluna ativa de sort em accent-primary. Pagination com active page accent-primary. Action menu como dropdown. Status como badge colorido. URL em mono font.

technologies-panel.name: Painel de Tecnologias
technologies-panel.description: Sheet lateral mostrando tecnologias detectadas no scan

tech-badge.note: Category badge uses accent variant for visual consistency (emerald light / indigo dark)

sections.name: tech-list
sections.content: Tecnologias agrupadas por categoria (Server, Framework, CMS, JS Library, etc.). Cada grupo com header e items abaixo.
sections.notes: Sheet slide-in pela direita. Agrupar por categoria com section labels. Cada item: nome + versão + badge de categoria em accent.

mode.toggle: Botão no navbar com ícone Sun/Moon. Respeitar prefers-color-scheme do sistema como valor inicial. Persistir preferência em localStorage.

density.description: Interface respirável com espaçamento generoso. Priorizar legibilidade sobre densidade de informação. Usar whitespace como elemento de design.

rules: Títulos de página em 2xl/semibold ou 3xl/bold
Subtítulos de seção em lg/semibold
Labels de cards/campos em sm/medium com cor muted-foreground
Valores/dados em base ou lg, cor foreground
Texto auxiliar em sm/normal, cor muted-foreground
Máximo 3 níveis de hierarquia visual por seção

responsiveness.sidebar: Colapsável em ícone-only em tablet, drawer em mobile
responsiveness.tables: Scroll horizontal em mobile com colunas priorizadas

rules: Contraste mínimo WCAG AA (4.5:1 texto, 3:1 UI)
Focus rings visíveis em todos os interativos — usar focus-ring.accent (emerald light / indigo dark)
Labels em todos os inputs
Alt text em todas as imagens
Keyboard navigation completa
aria-labels em ícones-only
Accent alpha values mantêm contraste adequado (verificar ratio em ambos os modos — emerald.600 sobre branco e indigo.400 sobre dark background)
Transições de 150-200ms para hover/focus
300ms para modais/sheets
Skeleton loading para conteúdo assíncrono
Respeitar prefers-reduced-motion
Glow effects devem ter transição de 200ms ease-out

accent-theme-split.light: emerald-600 (#059669) — transmite segurança, confiança e precisão técnica
accent-theme-split.dark: indigo-400 (#818CF8) — suavidade luminosa no fundo escuro
accent-theme-split.rationale: Emerald no light mode cria contraste natural com fundos brancos e transmite a sensação de sistema seguro e confiável. Indigo no dark mode mantém sofisticação sem agredir a retina.
accent-theme-split.token: accent-primary — único ponto de referência para implementação. Resolva para emerald.600 no light e indigo.400 no dark via CSS variables ou Tailwind theme.
accent-theme-split.implementation-hint: No tailwind.config.ts, definir 'accent-primary' como CSS variable que muda por [data-theme='light'] e [data-theme='dark']. Exemplo: '--color-accent-primary': tema === 'light' ? '#059669' : '#818CF8'

indigo-usage.principle: In dark mode, Indigo is the intelligent accent — use it to draw attention to what matters. In light mode, all interactive accent roles are fulfilled by emerald. Indigo remains the semantic 'info' color in both modes.
dark-mode-use-cases: Focus rings on all interactive elements (dark mode)
Active navigation items — sidebar + navbar (dark mode)
Primary CTA buttons when accent is needed (dark mode)
Hover border color on interactive cards (dark mode)
Badge for active filters and counts (dark mode)
Progress bars and spinners for primary actions (dark mode)
both-modes: Toast info variant left border (info semantic color)
The 'info' token in tokens.colors.light and tokens.colors.dark
avoid: Do NOT use as interactive accent in light mode — use emerald instead
Do NOT use as a full-page or section background
Do NOT use on body text
Do NOT use on non-interactive decorative elements in light mode
Do NOT combine with other strong accent colors in the same view
Do NOT exceed indigo/30 alpha for background fills

emerald-usage.principle: In light mode, Emerald is the primary interactive accent — use it for all focus, hover, active, and CTA states. In dark mode, Emerald remains the success/positive semantic color only.
light-mode-interactive-use-cases: Focus rings on all interactive elements (light mode)
Active navigation items — sidebar + navbar (light mode)
Hover border color on interactive cards (light mode)
Badge for active filters and counts — badge.accent (light mode)
Progress bars and spinners for primary actions (light mode)
both-modes-success-use-cases: Scan completed successfully — status badge and success-inline state
Healthy/passing check indicators in scan results
Positive trend badges (e.g. risk score improved)
Password strength 'strong' indicator on register page
Success state on landing page after scan initiation
avoid: Do NOT use emerald for interactive accent in dark mode — that role belongs to indigo
Do NOT use as a navigation or tab indicator in dark mode
Do NOT use on neutral or ambiguous states
Do NOT mix emerald and indigo on the same interactive element
Do NOT exceed emerald/30 alpha for background fills

elevation-usage.principle: Depth through shadow and background — not color. Objects closer to the user cast slightly larger shadows.
rules: Cards at rest: no shadow (flat, rely on border)
Cards on hover: shadow-sm or card-hover
Elevated cards (featured/important): shadow-md
Dropdowns and popovers: shadow-lg
Modals and sheets: shadow-xl
Active cards: accent-primary glow (emerald-sm light / indigo-sm dark) instead of larger shadow

implementation-notes: Usar CSS variables do shadcn/ui para todas as cores (--background, --foreground, etc.)
Configurar tailwind.config.ts com os tokens deste design system
Instalar JetBrains Mono para mono via next/font/google
Componentes shadcn/ui: Button, Card, Input, Table, Badge, Dialog, Sheet, Tabs, Accordion, Avatar, DropdownMenu, Toast, Skeleton, Tooltip
Charts: usar Recharts com wrapper shadcn/ui (chart component)
Ícones: Lucide React (já incluído no shadcn/ui)
Indigo e Emerald palettes podem ser adicionadas ao tailwind.config.ts como 'colors.indigo' e 'colors.emerald' usando os valores de tokens.colors.indigo e tokens.colors.emerald
Para o glow do input URL no light mode: usar class focus-within:shadow-[0_0_16px_-2px_rgba(5,150,105,0.25)] — no dark mode: focus-within:shadow-[0_0_20px_-2px_rgba(129,140,248,0.30)]
Sidebar active indicator: implementar como ::before pseudo-element ou div absoluta de 2px de largura
Accent-primary token: definir --color-accent-primary como CSS variable no :root (light: #059669) e .dark (dark: #818CF8)
Para button.accent: light mode class 'bg-emerald-600 hover:bg-emerald-700', dark mode class 'dark:bg-indigo-600 dark:hover:bg-indigo-500'
Para badge.accent: light mode class 'bg-emerald-600/8 text-emerald-700 border-emerald-600/25', dark mode class 'dark:bg-indigo-400/10 dark:text-indigo-400 dark:border-indigo-400/25'
